page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: The presence of coal has led to the development of housing within the village.Residential areas range from a planned area of old industrial housing-a model village with small terraced houses fronting narrow roads to new housing estates.These are council estates,NCB estates & private housing consisting of detached & semi- detached bungalows & low rise flats. The development tended to be linear, straddling the B6020 & the A617 in particular The Python Hill area consists chiefly of houses built between the wars with new developments on the fringes.The development on either side of the B6020 consists of both private & NCB housing (post-war).
